content.howToPlay: Scan the board and look for rows or columns where two matching shells or pearls sit beside an outsider.Drag that outsider into place to make a line of three, four, five or even more. They pop and score earned!Create power-ups.4 in a straight line creates Rocket (clears a full row or column).4 in a square creates Spinner (zaps one level target).5 in a T or L creates Bomb (big splash explosion).5 in a straight line creates Rainbow Flower (wipes every piece of the same color).Beat the level goal like collect seashells, break wooden blocks, untie ropes, drop keys, or hit a score before moves run out.Keep an eye on the move counter on the left. Running out means starting over!Each victory moves the story from wrecked galleon to coral city and finally the lonely island lighthouse.

fullContent: Home› PuzzleVega Mix: Sea AdventuresBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenRemember walking past your mom’s phone and seeing her nail the 1612th level of Candy Crush, combo, fireworks, cheers, the whole couch shaking with a mini victory dance? That quick burst of color pop satisfaction is what draws everyone back. Now, Vega Mix: Sea Adventures taps the same feel-good reflex, but it swaps sugar for seashells and drops the action to the ocean floor. You slide two clams together, bubbles rush upward, a Rocket power-up skims across the board, and suddenly you’re pocketing treasure to rebuild an old lighthouse before the kettle even whistles. Load it up in a five-mins break at work, or play it for an hour; zero downloads, no commitment, five-second learning curve, endless “just one more” dives, perfect for anyone who still owes Mom a few extra lives in Candy Crush.  ControlsClick and drag to swap two adjacent pieces.Esc to pause the game, adjust sound, or head back to the map.How to Play Vega Mix: Sea AdventuresScan the board and look for rows or columns where two matching shells or pearls sit beside an outsider.Drag that outsider into place to make a line of three, four, five or even more.
